item.title: All lanes reopened after serious crash on I-75S in Manatee County
item.description: Drivers can expect delays while crews work to clear the area

item.title: Students travel back in time on civil rights tour, "It was transformational"
See student dancers perform ancient epic- August 2, 2025, Sarasota Opera House
Suspected truck thieves arrested in Hillsborough
item.description: Suspected truck thieves arrested in Hillsborough

item.title: Goldton Jazz Ensemble keeps the music alive at Venice Senior Community
item.description: “It gives me joy and it gives me a purpose, and I actually get better, the more I do it.”

item.title: Another day of high heat before seasonable weather returns
Four charged in semi-truck thefts across Florida
item.description: Investigators say the four were targeting electronic control modules from Freightliner semi-trucks.

item.title: Hunks in Heels raises $54K to honor Englewood man’s memory
item.description: The 4th annual Hunks in Heels fundraiser was held at the Englewood Elks event center July 26.

item.title: Two found dead behind shopping center on Cattlemen Road
item.description: The man and woman were found just before 6:30 a.m. behind the Ollie’s Bargain Outlet.

item.title: Sarasota Police using high-tech training for new, improved Tasers
item.description: The new Tasers, and the training kit they came with, are a game changer, officers say.

item.title: Clearwater Ferry captain will also be charged in crash, FWC says
item.description: Jeffry Knight was arrested Monday afternoon and charged with eight felonies, the FWC said.

item.title: Bradenton man tells deputies he accidentally shot his father
item.description: The son told deputies he was showing his father a handgun when it accidentally went off.

item.title: Manatee County approves $13.5 million purchase of Mixon Fruit Farm
item.description: The Manatee County Commission approved the purchase in a 7-0 vote.

item.title: Heat issues continue on Wednesday
item.description: A heat advisory has been issued again for Wednesday with temperatures warming into the low to mid 90s
